allow: Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import os; os.environ[''ONCRAWL_API_TOKEN''] = ''04Q56SGGKZVXAZFKUR9JC0Q5GZCOAY1VA6O05POX''; from oncrawl_client import OnCrawlClient; print\(''Client initialized successfully''\); client = OnCrawlClient\(\); print\(''API token loaded:'', client.api_token[:10] + ''...''\)")
Bash(else echo "Config file does not exist yet")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import os; os.environ[''ONCRAWL_API_TOKEN''] = ''04Q56SGGKZVXAZFKUR9JC0Q5GZCOAY1VA6O05POX''; from oncrawl_mcp_server.oncrawl_client import OnCrawlClient; import json; client = OnCrawlClient\(\); project = client.get_project\(''5d56af5e451c95285b9a4953''\); print\(json.dumps\(project, indent=2\)\)")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import os; os.environ[''ONCRAWL_API_TOKEN''] = ''04Q56SGGKZVXAZFKUR9JC0Q5GZCOAY1VA6O05POX''; from oncrawl_mcp_server.oncrawl_client import OnCrawlClient; import json; client = OnCrawlClient\(\); result = client.search_crawl_over_crawl\(''695287eb3d6fc5e120f8766d'', fields=[''url''], limit=5\); print\(json.dumps\(result, indent=2\)[:2000]\)")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import os; os.environ[''ONCRAWL_API_TOKEN''] = ''04Q56SGGKZVXAZFKUR9JC0Q5GZCOAY1VA6O05POX''; from oncrawl_mcp_server.oncrawl_client import OnCrawlClient; import json; client = OnCrawlClient\(\); result = client.get_project\(''5d56af5e451c95285b9a4953''\); project = result.get\(''project'', result\); print\(f""Project: {project.get\(''domain''\)}""\); print\(f""Latest Crawl ID: {project.get\(''last_crawl_id''\)}""\); print\(f""Total Crawls: {len\(project.get\(''crawl_ids'', []\)\)}""\); print\(f""Crawl Date: {project.get\(''last_crawl_created_at''\)}""\)")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import os; os.environ[''ONCRAWL_API_TOKEN''] = ''04Q56SGGKZVXAZFKUR9JC0Q5GZCOAY1VA6O05POX''; from oncrawl_mcp_server.oncrawl_client import OnCrawlClient; import json; client = OnCrawlClient\(\); result = client.aggregate\(''6952431c25791bde18ff4da2'', aggs=[{''fields'': [{''name'': ''status_code''}]}]\); print\(json.dumps\(result, indent=2\)[:1500]\)")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import os; os.environ[''ONCRAWL_API_TOKEN''] = ''04Q56SGGKZVXAZFKUR9JC0Q5GZCOAY1VA6O05POX''; from oncrawl_mcp_server.oncrawl_client import OnCrawlClient; import json; client = OnCrawlClient\(\); result = client.search_pages\(''6952431c25791bde18ff4da2'', fields=[''url'', ''status_code'', ''depth'', ''follow_inlinks''], oql={''field'': [''follow_inlinks'', ''equals'', 0]}, limit=5\); print\(json.dumps\(result, indent=2\)[:1000]\)")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import os; os.environ[''ONCRAWL_API_TOKEN''] = ''04Q56SGGKZVXAZFKUR9JC0Q5GZCOAY1VA6O05POX''; from oncrawl_mcp_server.oncrawl_client import OnCrawlClient; import json; client = OnCrawlClient\(\); schema = client.get_fields\(''6952431c25791bde18ff4da2'', data_type=''pages''\); gsc_fields = [f for f in schema.get\(''fields'', []\) if ''gsc'' in f[''name''].lower\(\) or ''google'' in f[''name''].lower\(\) or ''traffic'' in f[''name''].lower\(\) or ''clicks'' in f[''name''].lower\(\) or ''impression'' in f[''name''].lower\(\)]; print\(f''Found {len\(gsc_fields\)} GSC/traffic fields:''\); print\(json.dumps\([{''name'': f[''name''], ''type'': f.get\(''type''\)} for f in gsc_fields[:30]], indent=2\)\)")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import os; os.environ[''ONCRAWL_API_TOKEN''] = ''04Q56SGGKZVXAZFKUR9JC0Q5GZCOAY1VA6O05POX''; from oncrawl_mcp_server.oncrawl_client import OnCrawlClient; import json; client = OnCrawlClient\(\); schema = client.get_fields\(''6952431c25791bde18ff4da2'', data_type=''pages''\); gsc_fields = [f for f in schema.get\(''fields'', []\) if ''gsc'' in f[''name''].lower\(\)]; print\(f''Found {len\(gsc_fields\)} GSC fields:''\); for f in gsc_fields[:40]: print\(f""  - {f[''name'']} \({f.get\(''type''\)}\)""\)")
